p:
Drug dispensing data collection and processing within the LTD database were approved by the French Data Protection Authority on October 21, 2011; the approval was updated in July 2018 to comply with the European General Data Protection Regulation and applicable laws. Patient consent was not required because the data used in this study were fully deidentified. This study complies with the guidelines for Reporting of Studies Conducted Using Observational Routinely Collected Data for Pharmacoepidemiology (RECORD-PE).
20
